name: DosKolossos
title: Portfolio
motivation: I am motivated to continuously feed my opponents. Team success is rated higher when the team is under massive pressure and needs to prove itself. My communication skills evoke a lot of emotions within my team.
ongoingProjectText: During my lunch break, I'm always looking for new players to play this fantastic game with in order to improve them. One match is enough to significantly improve them. After that, they no longer need my help.
mySkillsText: With every patch, the game becomes more extensive, and my deep understanding of risky tower dives grows. After minute 15, my team wants to give the opponent the chance to win, which is why FF15 is always communicated.
newTechnoText: I am always happy to learn new shortcuts like D for dance and FF15.
newTechnoTextMobile: I always try to expand my current skill set like E and R and I am happy to learn new technologies, just tell me what else do you need.

references.title: References
references.teamplayerText: Here what my team chat said about me

julian.name: Team member A
julian.comment: Dude, why are you always feeding?! Like, every single game, you overextend in lane, don’t ward, and then blame the jungler. I swear, it’s like you have no map awareness at all! You’re making it impossible for the rest of us to play. Can you just play safe for once? Stop diving under tower at 5 minutes and giving their top a free snowball!

sarah.name: Team member B
sarah.comment: FF15 or I’m running it down mid. At this point, the enemy top should be sending you thank-you cards for all the gold donations. You’re not just feeding—you’re catering their whole buffet. Are you secretly trying to boost them to Challenger? Like, what’s the strat here? Please enlighten us, because the rest of us are trying to win.

alexander.name: Team member C
alexander.comment: Dos is a very special player with his very own style of play. He's such a genius that it's impossible to follow his ideas. I'm always in the top 4 with Dos and I've become a much better player thanks to him. I always re-roll in the early game, giving me an unassailable advantage when I already have three units as three-stars at 2-7!

contactform.title: Contact Me
contactform.privacyPolicy2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contactform.subtextDescription: Whether your project involves developing a new application, upgrading existing systems, or implementing robust cybersecurity measures, I have the technical acumen and problem-solving skills to ensure successful outcomes.
